alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL, NORTHWESTERN HARDING, WEST CENTRAL UNION, SOUTHEASTERN MORA AND SOUTHEASTERN COLFAX COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gladstone to near Mills to 9 miles east of Valmora. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roy, Chicosa Lake State Park, Solano, Maes, Farley, Gladstone, Mills and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Union County
